documents.document: @gavreilly No shit, Sherlock! I mean it's not some sort of a horticultural swap club, is it? St. Patrick turning in grave here.
@gavreilly What if they haven't got an assport? Should they just put an iPhone charger in their bottoms?
@gavreilly Not the point. It is our right to ask him not to go. If enough people did, and loudly, he would reconsider. He's a politician.
“The Immigration Ban is a Headfake, and We’re Falling For It” by @jakefuentes https://t.co/EJdIQ8tH0V
@simoncoveney I would prefer if shamrock was not given to Trump. They will be delighted and see it as an endorsement (which it kind of is).
@HighNoonNT @ghook @EamonRyan Well said, Eamon. We have a good name and should use it. Remember the anti-apartheid Dunnes Stores workers.
@ghook @EamonRyan is right. We should make this stand. You're on the wrong side of history here. What does Ireland stand for today?
@ghook. What a hysterical, irritating and unpleasant tone that O'Keefe guy has. I wonder if he ever had fun.
@NChildersMEP @UpliftIRL Good for you, Nessa. Not in my name either - and it IS my name! Thanks.
@thejournal_ie Absolutely, yes. It is debasing everything we stand for as Irish people. Fawning hypocrisy. Shamrock? Shamerock!
Humanity strikes back at @realDonaldTrump. Join the #WorldToTrump open letter that’s sweeping the planet! #Trump https://t.co/5uLPPGZ80i
Absolutely agree. Shamrock, a powerful (and green) symbol of our spirit should not be defiled in this way. @ghook https://t.co/QNbvZKIOAa
Well done, Simon. Thanks for this. Could we have a statement on the #MuslimBan as well? https://t.co/CMhJ26aTUM
@bibibaskin @ghook How's he doing, then?
@RousseauAl But don't you work for Trump fan @ghook, Alex?
That's great. Well done @GeraintDaviesMP https://t.co/yPtsymsKLl
@ghook @BibiBaskin Are you pleased with how your boy is doing after a week in office? You wanted to give him a chance, yeah?
When I was 18, I had a job in a quiet bar where John Hurt came every day. He turned the place around (and told me I was very ironic person)
@VisitDublin Did you know that picture was taken 1/2 a mile from a raw sewage outfall at #doldrumbay?
@AodhanORiordain On St.Patrick's Day, Enda Kenny will present shamrock to a sham president. #notourshamrock #lickrechaun
@hikki_tai Really? That's interesting. No doubt for British English.
@Independent_ie and went on to be POTUS (sorry that's rather rude - to gorillas)
@JohnLyonsPBPA @bright_side_me My experience of the left-hand side backs this up.
@jdslagoski @ebefl Which we did - gathering input from experts. Do you mean better PD for teachers?
@jdslagoski @ebefl We also dismantled every other book on the market - endless word lists! Guess you mean pedagogical research though.
@jdslagoski @ebefl We did a survey of 6,000 teachers for a primary course I worked on. That provided a lot of useful information.
@jdslagoski @ebefl Belief, precedent and input/feedback from market...What evidence could they use?
The true, correct story of what happened at Donald Trump's inauguration https://t.co/GfD04w8rBI
@JamesTCobbler Presumably some sort of coat hanger...with mother killer in it?
@cbolgerr OK. How about his moving to repeal the ACA (Obamacare)?
Over 2100 people go missing in Surrey every year. You learn something new every day. https://t.co/31tMiEtrxN
@cbolgerr If they want to. And they sure seem to. Solidarity against his anti-women/LGBTQ/environment/truth/Islam agenda and rhetoric.
@amz360 @odysseuslahori Sorry, I misunderstood. I thought you said it was an illegitimate protest. See above.
@y_s_khan @odysseuslahori We don't know that but I doubt it. He is very thin-skinned and desperate for approval. How would you feel?
@amz360 @odysseuslahori Actually it is perfectly legitimate to protest. That's not spoilsport. That's the right to freedom of speech.
@odysseuslahori No, (but he should) and it is important for people to be able to express their disgust and commitment to standing up to him
@NewstalkFM I bet @ghook will have a field day with that.
@CllrKRedmond Anyway - we've all seen this. Friend of yours?https://t.co/hIwisorvVG
@CllrKRedmond I'll bet you can't resist though. Gives a new meaning to the word "claptrap". You should be Enamelling not Enabling!
@CllrKRedmond Actually UR giving the content a thumbs up. Do you force your patients to listen? Not harm-free and with a captive audience!
You're retweeting Trump, Keith? Harmful policies like the Climate Action Plan? And I thought you were just a harmle… https://t.co/prQ2H41sqV
Said a lot of people on the right side of history never. https://t.co/SCy45FJ6WU
@MomsRising Watching from the U.K. Great speech!!!
@BibiBaskin @ghook Let it be remembered that this is who you chose to support. As a matter of interest, do either o… https://t.co/nJyaDwTUy7
@redheadlefthand Don't worry. It'll all be over before you know it and we can sell what's left for kindling.
@josipa74 @NicolaPrentis @MarekKiczkowiak TBH not really sure what I'm talking about. Especially re evil Pearson. More of an OUP chap myself
@josipa74 @NicolaPrentis @MarekKiczkowiak "Things" are changing rapidly. "They're" just trying to hold onto their hats.
It looks like Splash Mountain but this ride is going back to the Dark Ages. #inauguration
@josipa74 @NicolaPrentis @MarekKiczkowiak What do you want them to do?
@josipa74 @NicolaPrentis @MarekKiczkowiak Multi-billion surely? (checks royalty statement)
@ghook Great service is taken for granted in Japan. No tipping. Lived there for 12 years and only got off-hand service once.
@RousseauAl @ghook Thanks for that chance to speak (very nervously) and for the shout out for #doldrumbay.
@RousseauAl OK. Understood. I'll squeeze it in somehow! Sending my number.
@josipa74 @NicolaPrentis @MarekKiczkowiak Pie in the sky? Not very nourishing! Who's eating it at the moment?
@RousseauAl @ghook I'm up for it if GH will ask me a question about Doldrum Bay #doldrumbay. I totally understand if not possible.
@josipa74 @NicolaPrentis @MarekKiczkowiak What pie?
@RousseauAl @ghook Can I say something about #doldrumbay too? If so, I'd be happy to be on the show.
@RousseauAl Hi Alex. To interview me about what?
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Enough of what? Enough of calling you out on this? You're the one who went on TV to support him
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane What you are talking about is not kindness. It's servicing a villain. For a pay check.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Maybe he should've been "a little kinder" when he was lying about Obama's birth certificate.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Maybe he should've been "a little kinder" when he was portraying Mexicans as rapists.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Maybe he should've been "a little kinder" when he was encouraging violence at his rallies.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Maybe he should've been "a little kinder" when he was grabbing women by the pussy.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Maybe he should've been "a little kinder" when he was mocking someone for their disabilities.
Great picture. #doldrumbay raw sewage outfall in the background there at #howth @dublinbiosphere @IrishWater https://t.co/10KVn8mNmk
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Dancing for that scumbag or standing by those who do is not OK.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane RTE player crashed as you said "He should do it. They're friends" or some such twaddle.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Don't tell us you are a handmaid (is that a PC term?) of the Cheeto Satan. Please.
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane Would you go as a supporter? Or just to watch an orange turd rising in the west?
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane No, but it'll get you attention. Would you attend the event, Bibi?
@BibiBaskin @ghook @daithi_ose @MauraDerrane It will make popular? What? Who? Him? Why?
@ruairimckiernan @MichaelFlatley I doubt it's just the money. He probably believes it'll make him great again.
@MichaelFlatley And performing for Trump too? Very Creepy.
@BibiBaskin @ghook Really? Why?
@ghook Why is that fantastic news?
@MichaelDelauzon Her face or her body? Or both?
@JustinNoppe What age group?

@ruairimckiernan @denisstaunton that's why they should stay in the EU
@irishexaminer All those Brits pouring in unscreened?

@Newshub_Ireland Pasty fingers pinch the tragic flag. Watery eyes scan the road. But He's not coming. He couldn't care less! Sad.

@MCol_Hockey Great performance but what an agonising loss in last minute for the Yearlings 2nds!
